sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.*, b.project_actual_no, b.project_name, c.customer_fullName FROM tbl_customer_supposed_income a, tbl_project_info b, tbl_customer_info c WHERE a.project_no = b.contract_no AND a.customer_id = c.customer_id
and b.project_actual_no=#projectNo:VARCHAR#
and b.project_name LIKE '%$projectName$%'
and c.customer_fullName LIKE '%$customerShortName$%'
a.income_date= #incomeDate:VARCHAR#

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_customer_supposed_income a, tbl_project_info b, tbl_customer_info c WHERE a.project_no = b.contract_no AND a.customer_id = c.customer_id
and b.project_actual_no=#projectNo:VARCHAR#
and b.project_name LIKE '%$projectName$%'
and c.customer_fullName LIKE '%$customerShortName$%'
a.income_date= #incomeDate:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update tbl_customer_supposed_income set income_date=#incomeDate:VARCHAR#, already_income=#alreadyIncome:VARCHAR#, not_income=#notIncome:VARCHAR# where project_no = #projectNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.short_project_name, a.project_actual_no, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, c.customer_fullName, e.pre_contract_amount, e.pre_man_month, e.completeness, f.total_cost, g.month_inwork FROM tbl_project_info a, tbl_department_info b, tbl_customer_info c, tbl_contract_info d, tbl_project_pre_amount e, tbl_project_cost f, tbl_inwork g WHERE d.contract_no = a.contract_no AND a.department_id = b.DEPARTMENT_ID AND d.customer_id = c.customer_id AND d.contract_no = e.project_no AND d.contract_no = f.contract_no AND d.project_type = '0' AND d.contract_no = g.project_no

SELECT count( * ) FROM tbl_project_info a, tbl_department_info b, tbl_customer_info c, tbl_contract_info d, tbl_project_pre_amount e, tbl_project_cost f, tbl_inwork g WHERE d.contract_no = a.contract_no AND a.department_id = b.DEPARTMENT_ID AND d.customer_id = c.customer_id AND d.contract_no = e.project_no AND d.contract_no = f.contract_no AND d.project_type = '0' AND d.contract_no = g.project_no

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_project_info a, tbl_department_info b, tbl_contract_info d, tbl_project_pre_amount e, tbl_project_cost f, tbl_inwork g WHERE d.contract_no = a.contract_no AND a.department_id = b.DEPARTMENT_ID AND d.contract_no = e.project_no AND d.contract_no = f.contract_no AND d.project_type = '1' AND d.contract_no = g.project_no AND g.inwork_date = #value:VARCHAR#

SELECT b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, e.pre_contract_amount, e.pre_man_month, a.plan_start_date, a.plan_end_date, g.customer_all_inwork, g.all_inwork, g.customer_month_inwork, g.month_inwork, f.total_cost, g.project_no FROM tbl_project_info a, tbl_department_info b, tbl_contract_info d, tbl_project_pre_amount e, tbl_project_cost f, tbl_inwork g WHERE d.contract_no = a.contract_no AND a.department_id = b.DEPARTMENT_ID AND d.contract_no = e.project_no AND d.contract_no = f.contract_no AND d.project_type = '1' AND d.contract_no = g.project_no AND g.inwork_date = #value:VARCHAR#
SELECT g.project_no, g.customer_all_inwork, g.all_inwork FROM tbl_inwork g WHERE g.inwork_date = #value:VARCHAR#
